name: Air Strike HD - Classic 3D Sky Combat Flight Simulator, Warplanes of World War II
name_original: Air Strike HD - Classic 3D Sky Combat Flight Simulator, Warplanes of World War II
description:
Dominate the sky in the world’s most advanced air fighting game for Mac - Air Strike HD!

---- AMAZING GAMEPLAY ----
Enjoy realistic combat flight simulator with action-packed gameplay.Go through intensive air combats, earn points and defeat the enemies!

---- STUNNING GRAPHICS ----
Experience highly detailed aircraft models from different manufacturers. Play on your TV with an Apple TV and AirPlay for a true HD gaming experience.

---- GAME CENTER SUPPORT ----
Play with your friends, earn points using Game Center. Compete on leaderboards, while completing friend challenges! Take down your friends in score competitions.


FEATURES:
-World War 2 warplanes!
- Powerful weapons!
-Next-Generation 3D graphics with Retina Display
-Award-winning visual and sound effects

We will update and improve Air Strike HD constantly.
Please rate and give your feedback for further improvement of the game.

Experience the world leading air combat game today!
